001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo.bitcore;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.Address;
004
005import java.util.List;
006
007/**
008 * Address Request for BitCore {@code getaddressbalance} and others.
009 * Typically passed in the request as a JSON-RPC parameter.
010 */
011public class AddressRequest {
012    private final List<Address> addresses;
013    public AddressRequest(List<Address> addresses) {
014        this.addresses = addresses;
015    }
016
017    public List<Address> getAddresses() {
018        return addresses;
019    }
020}
